Key Match Events: Detroit guard Jaden Ivey sustained a severe injury to his lower left leg in the fourth quarter of Detroit’s victory over the Orlando Magic.
Orlando’s Cole Anthony slipped and fell, causing him to collide with Ivey’s planted leg, leading to the injury.
Ivey was in obvious distress and was attended to by Detroit’s medical staff before being wheeled out of the arena on a stretcher.
Post-Match Reflections: Pistons coach J.B. Bickerstaff praised his team for their effort and dedication, stating that they did not want to let Ivey down after his injury.
